message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,350,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal.  While $1,200,000 is a significant sum, this product offers substantial value that I'm confident will make it a wise investment for you. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,300,000. This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,250,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
